duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive operational strategies to ensure guest satisfaction and the efficient operation of the hotel.
Lead and supervise operational departments, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze financial reports, cost control measures, and revenue generation to identify areas for improvement and develop strategies for profitability.
Support the General Manager in creating a positive team-oriented environment that focuses on guest satisfaction and employee development.
Maintain compliance with preventative maintenance and deep cleaning programs through regular inspection of rooms and collaboration with department heads.
Attend all scheduled meetings and participate in required M.O.D. coverage as scheduled.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
